duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform preventative and corrective maintenance procedures on material handling equipment, powered equipment, and physical building structures.
Analyze, improve, and repair equipment using diagnostics and troubleshooting skills.
Install, troubleshoot, and repair electrical systems, motors, motor controls, wiring, and HVAC systems.
Perform welding, plumbing, carpentry, and general building maintenance tasks.
Read and interpret schematics, blueprints, and technical documentation for maintenance.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, with electrical maintenance training/certification
